definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺结核所致肺心病的诊断和治疗特点。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of acid-fast stain test of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the diagnosis of pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解结核分枝杆菌抗酸染色对肺结核的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解村医生督导管理肺结核病人现状及影响因素。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the liver damages caused by antituberculosis drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解抗结核药物引起肺结核患者的肝损害。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the pulmonary tuberculosis mortality risk of the residents in high background radiation area (HBRA), Yangjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨天然放射性高本底地区居民肺结核死亡危险。

sentences.english: Objective To test the efficacy of rifapention on treating patients with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证利福喷丁治疗肺结核病的疗效。

sentences.english: Today, rifampin is used in combination with two other medicines to treat tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 今天，利福平被用来和其他两种药化合以治疗肺结核。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the treatment effects of smear-positive cases with pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析涂阳肺结核病人的化疗效果。

sentences.english: TB is the number-one infectious disease killer in the world. Early detection saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 肺结核是全球头号传染病杀手，发现得早能救你一命。

sentences.english: Chest X-ray mass screening has been widely used for detecting pulmonary tuberculosis all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 集体X线检查曾广泛用于各国进行肺结核患者发现。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of thymus peptide as a supplementary cure in the retreatment of serious pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察复治重症肺结核采用胸腺肽辅助治疗的疗效。

sentences.english: They do not suffer coffering coughing, increased body temperature or other signs of active TB.
sentences.chinese: 的咳嗽，体温的上升或者肺结核的别的症状。

sentences.english: TB is the seventh-highest cause of mortality in poor countries.
sentences.chinese: 肺结核是贫穷国家第七大死因。

sentences.english: The delayed rate of newly registered smear positive patients was over 64%.
sentences.chinese: 新登涂阳肺结核病人延误为64%以上。

sentences.english: What is is tuberculosis treated first?
We report a case of pulmonary tuberculosis with hemoptysis as the initial presentation.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个肺结核病例咳血为其最开始症状。
